summary: This bill, the "Restoring Safeguards for Dangerous Abortion Drugs Act," focuses on mifepristone. It mandates the Secretary of Health and Human Services to reinstate the June 2011 risk evaluation and mitigation strategy for the drug. The bill also establishes liability for entities involved in the illegal import or transport of mifepristone, allowing individuals harmed by the drug to sue for damages. Furthermore, it prohibits the importation of mifepristone into the United States, including through mail.
